name: Magical Revolt: Mimiko's choice
description:
Available in English and Spanish!

Synopsis

The company Magical Shield offers to the market bodyguards customized as magical girls. 

Mimiko is one of these laboratory "products". She works as a bodyguard for an idol along with Puchin, her magical pet and only friend. Their work will be interrupted by an approaching revolt. Mimiko will have to choose between supporting the magical girls' rebel cause or staying loyal to the company.

Magical Revolt: Mimiko’s Choice is a visual novel of the magical girls genre in a cyberpunk setting. It presents a world plagued by mistreatment and abuse where, however, there is still a place for friendship, love and True Magic.

Main cast

  • A damaged and broken magical girl, accompanied by a sickly but cute little kitten 
  • A rebel and badass magical girl that could kick your ass
  • Two capricious and quite unbearable idols 

Features

  • Available in English and Spanish
  • 7000 words
  • Decisions that matter (You have to choose a side, right?)
  • 6 original tracks

 ⚠ Warnings

Text contains mentions of sexual harassment, violence, murder and suicide
